item.title: galarian meowth
item.description:
another pok√©design. i kinda like galarian meowth even though i don't like purrserker. it happens, i guess
‚ÄúA self-confident and standoffish Meowth. She is generally nice, but just prefers being alone. To that end, her brusque behavior tends to keep others away.‚Äù
character theme: ‚ô™ GET ON A TRAIN [backing repeat] (STREET FIGHTER III NEW GENERATION ORIGINAL ARRANGE SOUNDTRACK)

item.title: king ask #1
item.description:
king is asked about his armor
transcription without the funny archaic letters: ‚ÄúNay, this fine suit of armor hath been my sole abode since afore mine earliest memories. Upon my wake in this new body, it brought me severe dolor. Now, such time has passed that I'd nary dream of inhabiting any other!‚Äù
